long_description: Discover your own paradise with the Burton Paradise snowboard pack. It affords you access to backcountry nooks that no car or chairlift can deliver. Ergonomic, compression-molded back panel and cushy shoulder harness enhance comfort. Convenient panel entry provides access to your gear even when a snowboard is attached. Internal shovel and probe storage keeps gear dry, clean and secure-ready for use at a moment's notice. Straps on the back of the Burton Paradise pack let you carry your board vertically for a secure, balanced load.
short_description: Discover your own paradise with the Burton Paradise snowboard pack. It affords you access to backcountry nooks that no car or chairlift can deliver.
